# RGBA Color Namespace Definition Table

Here is the table of RGBA colors defined in the `MyEngine::RGBAColor` namespace.

## Grayscale Colors

| Color Name                                                     | Hex code (without Alpha) | Hex code | RGBA (SDL_Color) |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| <div style="width: 32px; height: 32px; background-color: #FFFFFF00"></div>Transparent | `0xffffff`                                  | `0xffffff00`              | `SColor(255, 255, 255, 0)`          |
| <div style="width: 32px; height: 32px; background-color: #FFFFFF80"></div>HalfTransparent | `0xffffff`                                  | `0xffffff80`              | `SColor(255, 255, 255, 128)`        |
| <div style="width: 32px; height: 32px; background-color: #000000"></div>Black | `0x000000`                                  | `0x000000ff`              | `SColor(0, 0, 0, 255)`              |
| <div style="width: 32px; height: 32px; background-color: #FFFFFF"></div>White | `0xffffff`                                  | `0xffffffff`              | `SColor(255, 255, 255, 255)`        |
